name: PetalOS 1.5.2 Concept
description:
As you can see, i'm a real fan of Huawei, so i've decided to create like a ChromeOS but with Petal. That's the 1.5.2 Version, featuring the home menu.

I've changed from HarmonyOS Desktop to PetalOS because it's more like a simple OS, like Google's ChromeOS. I will make HMOS later.
